notes.text:
Frying the curry paste releases its aromatics
Add bamboo shoots for authentic texture
Adjust sweetness and saltiness to taste

steps.descr: Heat oil in a wok, fry curry paste for 1 minute until fragrant

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by heating some oil in your wok. Add the curry paste and fry it for a minute until it's beautifully fragrant. You'll know it's ready when you can really smell those lovely aromas!

steps.instructions: Heat oil in a wok, fry curry paste for 1 minute until fragrant

steps.descr: Add chicken and cook until sealed

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the chicken to the wok. Cook it until it's nicely sealed on the outside. You want to see a lovely white colour on the chicken.

steps.instructions: Add chicken and cook until sealed

steps.descr: Pour in coconut milk and bring to simmer

on_enter.say: Time to pour in the coconut milk. Give it a good stir and bring it to a gentle simmer. You should see small bubbles forming on the surface.

steps.instructions: Pour in coconut milk and bring to simmer

steps.descr: Add vegetables and cook for 8-10 minutes

on_enter.say: Let's add those vibrant vegetables to the wok. Cook them for about 8 to 10 minutes until they're tender but still have a bit of crunch. Keep an eye on them!

steps.instructions: Add vegetables and cook for 8-10 minutes

steps.descr: Stir in fish sauce and palm sugar

on_enter.say: Now, let's stir in the fish sauce and palm sugar. This will add a lovely balance of salty and sweet to your curry. Give it a good mix!

steps.instructions: Stir in fish sauce and palm sugar

steps.descr: Add Thai basil just before serving

on_enter.say: Just before serving, let's add those fresh Thai basil leaves. They'll add a beautiful fragrance and a pop of colour to your dish.

steps.instructions: Add Thai basil just before serving

on_enter.say: Time to serve up your delicious Thai Green Curry! Spoon it over some fluffy jasmine rice and enjoy every bite. Well done!

recipe.title: Thai Green Curry
recipe.description: Aromatic coconut curry with vegetables and fragrant Thai basil
